entry.title: Monday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending early this evening then clearing. Snow near the Rockies this evening and after midnight. Amount 4 cm near the Rockies. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 20.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 28 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 20 February 2023
